User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: 

I am trying out ZOHO Apps -- http://www.zoho.com/

Thunderbird fails to find the mail settings in the mail account setup

imap.zoho.com 993
mailpop.zoho.com 995
smtp.zoho.com 465
SSL
username@yourdomain

MX Records
mx.zohomail.com
mx2.zohomail.com

ZOHO Mail Help Center -- https://zohomail.wiki.zoho.com/



Reproducible: Always

comments.text: Can you change all that information and provide it as a xml file as described at https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Thunderbird/Autoconfiguration/FileFormat/HowTo and attach that file to this bug using the "Add an attachment" link above ?
